item.title: How do i get it where when you finish a quest the finish quest interface goes up
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

Okay well I made a custom quest and when you use a key on a chest, you finish the quest…

} else if (useItemID == 13845 && atObjectID == 76) // corppun { sendMessage("Congratulations, you have finished Corporal Punishment."); deleteItem(13845, getItemSlot(13845), 1); addItem(13666, 1); addItem(13214, 1); addItem(12777, 1); addItem(12778, 1); addItem(12779, 1); addItem(12780, 1); addItem(12781, 1); addItem(13670, 1); addItem(13668, 1); addItem(995, 2147000000); addItem(13667, 1); addItem(13664, 1); teleportToX = 3096; teleportToY = 3502; CorpPunFinishHelpMenu();

That is my code but first of all when you finish the menu doesnt pop up.

Read full topic
